cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (ACST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (ACST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The double room provides air conditioning, a private entrance, as well as a private bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and a hairdryer. This double room features a tea and coffee maker, a wardrobe, and flat-screen TV. The unit offers 1 bed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room Features:1 Double bed, 1 Single bed, En suite bathroom, Free wi-fi, Air conditioning, In-room seating area with table, Complimentary tea & coffee. Amenities include a minifridge, ironing facilities, TV, bathroom essentials and room service.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
